example.captcha
Class CookieImageCaptchaService

java.lang.Object
  example.captcha.CookieImageCaptchaService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClusteredImageCaptchaService
public class CookieImageCaptchaService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusteredImageCaptchaService

The cookie HTTP image captcha service does not rely on storing the id/answer locally, the generated challenge answer is ciphered and stored in a cookie to be deciphered and validated. The rule is that a challenge can only be validated once (burn-key after use), this to avoid spam.

getImageChallenge

public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImageChallenge(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                               throws com.octo.captcha.service.CaptchaServiceException
Description copied from interface: ClusteredImageCaptchaService
Method to retrieve the image challenge. As a side effect a ciphered answer cookie will be set containing the answer for the returned challenge.

Specified by:
getImageChallenge in interface ClusteredImageCaptchaService
Parameters:
response - the response to set the ciphered answer cookie to.
Returns:
the image challenge
Throws:
com.octo.captcha.service.CaptchaServiceException - if failed to generate a challenge

validateAnswer

public boolean validateAnswer(java.lang.String answer,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                       throws com.octo.captcha.service.CaptchaServiceException
Description copied from interface: ClusteredImageCaptchaService
Method to validate an answer. The request is assumed to contain the answer cookie. As a side effect the cookie (is existing) will be invalidated (from the response).

Specified by:
validateAnswer in interface ClusteredImageCaptchaService
Parameters:
answer - the answer to validate
request - the request to get the ciphered answer cookie from.
response - the response to invalidate the answer cookie (if valid answer)
Returns:
true if the response is correct, false otherwise.
Throws:
com.octo.captcha.service.CaptchaServiceException - if failed to validate the answer
